title: As COVID-19 wave begins to flatten in India, new deadly illness poses a challenge
content:
1. As COVID-19 wave begins to flatten in India, new deadly illness poses a challenge  CBS News
  2. In the Wake of India’s Covid Crisis, a ‘Black Fungus’ Epidemic Follows  The New York Times
  3. India's "black fungus" infections exacerbated by crowded hospitals, lack of oxygen  Axios
  4. India struggles with COVID-19 as a new infection targets survivors  CBS Evening News
  5. Covid News: India’s ‘Black Fungus’ Crisis Spreads  The New York Times
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
